mapper.select: select m.* from match_members mm join matches m on mm.match_id = m.match_id where mm.member_id = #{memberId} and m.travel_end_date >= current_date()

select * from matches where 1=1
and match_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY match_id DESC
ORDER BY hit DESC
ORDER BY match_id DESC
limit #{start}, #{listsize}
